mapper.update: update company_member set introduction=#{introduction}, company_type=#{companyType}, industry=#{industry}, sales=#{sales}, date_of_establishment=#{dateOfEstablishment}, num_of_employees=#{numOfEmployees} where company_id=#{id}
update member set password=#{password}, email=#{email}, address=#{address}, tel=#{tel} where id=#{id}
